title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 points:

  • One point is earned for indicating that the profit-maximizing output=4 units (or between 4 and 5 units).

  • One point is earned for explaining that MR>MC for all units until Q=5 (or direct calculation of TR-TC).

  • One point is earned for explaining that MR>MC for all units until Q=5 (or direct calculation of TR-TC).

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 points:

  • One point is earned for concluding that the number of firms will increase.

  • One point is earned for explaining that profits will attract new firms to enter.
